trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to render a check box control with or without visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于呈现具有或不具有可视样式的复选框控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer> class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a check box control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer>类提供了一套`static`可以用于呈现复选框控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: To draw a check box, use one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制的复选框，使用之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image with the check box.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法提供了各种选项，如绘制文本或图像与该复选框。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%2A> will draw the check box with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%2A>将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%2A> will draw the check box with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%2A>将绘制具有经典的 Windows 样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，如果您正在绘制的操作系统中的当前视觉样式设置应自动匹配的自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: This class wraps the functionality of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType> that is set to one of the elements exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.CheckBox?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类包装的功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置为其中一个元素由公开<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.CheckBox?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to write a custom control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%2A> method to draw a check box that responds to mouse clicks.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何编写使用的自定义控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%2A>方法来绘制响应鼠标单击的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Draws a check box control.
trans-unit.target: 绘制复选框控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the check box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the check box glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框标志符号的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the check box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定复选框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a check box control in the specified state and location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定状态和位置绘制复选框控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将绘制具有经典的 Windows 样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the check box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the check box glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框标志符号的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>checkBoxText</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 在其中绘制 <c>checkBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw with the check box.
trans-unit.target: 要随同此复选框一起绘制的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>checkBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于 <c>checkBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制一个聚焦框，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the check box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定复选框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a check box control in the specified state and location, with the specified text, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定文本和可选聚焦框在指定状态和位置绘制复选框控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将绘制具有经典的 Windows 样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the check box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the check box glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框标志符号的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>checkBoxText</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 在其中绘制 <c>checkBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw with the check box.
trans-unit.target: 要随同此复选框一起绘制的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>checkBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于 <c>checkBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制一个聚焦框，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the check box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定复选框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a check box control in the specified state and location, with the specified text and text formatting, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定文本、文本格式设置和可选聚焦框在指定状态和位置绘制复选框控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将绘制具有经典的 Windows 样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%28System.Drawing.Graphics%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState%29> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw a check box in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.DrawCheckBox%28System.Drawing.Graphics%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState%29>中自定义控件的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法，以便绘制在鼠标指针的位置确定的状态的复选框。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer>类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the check box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the check box glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框标志符号的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>checkBoxText</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 在其中绘制 <c>checkBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw with the check box.
trans-unit.target: 要随同此复选框一起绘制的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>checkBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于 <c>checkBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw with the check box.
trans-unit.target: 要随同此复选框一起绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the dimensions of <c>image</c>.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <c>image</c> 尺寸的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制一个聚焦框，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the check box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定复选框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a check box control in the specified state and location, with the specified text and image, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定文本、图像及可选聚焦框在指定状态和位置绘制复选框控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将绘制具有经典的 Windows 样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the check box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the check box glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制复选框标志符号的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>checkBoxText</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 在其中绘制 <c>checkBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw with the check box.
trans-unit.target: 要随同此复选框一起绘制的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>checkBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于 <c>checkBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw with the check box.
trans-unit.target: 要随同此复选框一起绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the dimensions of <c>image</c>.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <c>image</c> 尺寸的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制一个聚焦框，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the check box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定复选框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a check box control in the specified state and location; with the specified text, text formatting, and image; and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定文本、文本格式设置、图像及可选聚焦框在指定状态和位置绘制复选框控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将绘制具有经典的 Windows 样式的复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the background of the parent of <c>childControl</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制 <c>childControl</c> 的父级的背景的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which to draw the parent control's background.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，将在其中绘制父控件的背景。

trans-unit.source: This rectangle should be inside the child control’s bounds.
trans-unit.target: 此矩形应位于子控件的边界之内。

trans-unit.source: The control whose parent's background will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 将绘制其父控件的背景的控件。

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of a control's parent in the specified area.
trans-unit.target: 在指定区域中绘制控件的父级的背景。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> this operation will use.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将使用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the check box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定复选框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of the check box glyph.
trans-unit.target: 返回复选框标志符号的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the check box glyph.
trans-unit.target: 表示复选框标志符号大小的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: The size of the check box glyph is determined by the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由操作系统的当前视觉样式确定复选框标志符号的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.GetGlyphSize%2A> method to determine the bounds of the check box text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.GetGlyphSize%2A>方法来确定复选框文本的边界。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer>类。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the check box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定复选框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the background of the check box has semitransparent or alpha-blended pieces.
trans-unit.target: 指示复选框的背景是否具有半透明或 Alpha 混合的斑块。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the background of the check box has semitransparent or alpha-blended pieces; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果复选框的背景具有半透明或 Alpha 混合的斑块，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示呈现器是否使用应用程序状态来确定呈现样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用应用程序状态确定呈现样式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer> uses the setting from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the rendering style.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A>属性是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer>使用从设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来确定呈现样式。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A> is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A>是`false`，呈现器将始终使用视觉样式来呈现。
